Description
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consecteturew adipiscing elit. Nulla id sapien ut metus duba dapibus auctor. Nunc blandit in fermentumm
A riot ensues in the streets, led by the donkeys.

entries.sourceEnglish: When would we prefer to have it?!

entries.context: Our core cast drives past the riot in the tractor, which promptly dies. The Herd emerges onto the street
entries.sourceEnglish: Aw dang! The Tractor-Machine's choking. Maybe it needs a break.

entries.context: Said if Sad Ass is not in the party.
entries.sourceEnglish: How will we ever find our Comrades?

entries.context: Said instead of the line above, if Sad Ass is in the party.
entries.sourceEnglish: It'll be impossible to find the others in this mess...
I have a bad feeling about this...
Slow Ass! Where in the world did ya bring us to?!
Smart and the others are b-bound to b-be here somewhere.
We will cover more ground by splitting up.

entries.context: Said if the Good Hard Ass won in the E6 Nightmare fight
entries.sourceEnglish: Find the others and meet back here as soon as you can.

entries.context: Everyone runs off, we're left with Slow Ass who has to fight.
Said if the Bad Hard Ass won in the E6 Nightmare fight
entries.sourceEnglish: If you come across any Humans. Don't hold back.

entries.context: Everyone runs off, we're left with Slow Ass who has to fight.
Post Slow-Ass Fight, if went to Circus
entries.sourceEnglish: Oof! They saw right through my costume...

entries.context: Post Slow-Ass Fight, if went to Zoo
entries.sourceEnglish: Oof! If only I had my Ointment...

entries.context: Description
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consecteturew adipiscing elit. Nulla id sapien ut metus duba dapibus auctor. Nunc blandit in fermentumm
Zooming over to elsewhere in the city, we see Nice Ass about to fight.
entries.sourceEnglish: Gosh! I gotta find the others before it's too late!

entries.context: Post Nice-Ass Fight, if lost the fight and Sad isn't in the city (left the rest of the Herd at the Zoo). The camera fades out.

Post Nice-Ass Fight, if lost the fight and Sad is in the city (was in the factory). 
Sad Ass finds Nice Ass on the ground, beaten.

entries.sourceEnglish: Comrade, what are you doing here?
Oh Nice, you've always come to my rescue... I'm glad I can come to yours for once...

entries.context: They run off.

Post Nice-Ass Fight, if won the fight and Sad is in the city (was in the factory). 
Nice Ass finds Sad Ass on the ground, beaten.
entries.sourceEnglish: Sad Ass! Can you hear me?
Nice Ass? You saved me... again?
Even after I chose to leave Fannyside?
I guess I can always count on you no matter what trouble I end up in...

entries.context: They run off.
entries.sourceEnglish: Now, let's go find the others!

entries.context: Description
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consecteturew adipiscing elit. Nulla id sapien ut metus duba dapibus auctor. Nunc blandit in fermentumm
Zooming over to elsewhere in the city, we see Sad Ass about to fight (if Sad Ass is in the city).
Post Sad-Ass Fight, if lost the fight.
Description
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consecteturew adipiscing elit. Nulla id sapien ut metus duba dapibus auctor. Nunc blandit in fermentumm
Zooming over to elsewhere in the city, we see Thirsty Ass about to fight.
Post Thirsty-Ass Fight, if won the fight.
Thirsty Ass finds Kick Ass stomping on a Human, beaten.

entries.sourceEnglish: We came here to rescue y'all, but it looks like y'all are doin' fine on yer own!

entries.context: Go to line 22
entries.sourceEnglish: We got SEPARATED in the crowd.

entries.context: Post Thirsty-Ass Fight, if lost the fight.
Kick Ass arrives and finds Thirsty on the ground, beaten.

entries.sourceEnglish: What a sight for sore eyes—if it ain't Kick Ass!
Thirsty? What are you doing HERE?
We came to git you Comrade.
We came to bring you home.
You'll have me BACK? After everything I've DONE?
What matters most, is that we stick together.

entries.context: Go to line 22
entries.sourceEnglish: Plus, I need more customers! I finally opened The Bottom's Up Ba—

entries.context: Proper Ass enters and invites them to the government building.

entries.sourceEnglish: We have located the building where the Humans make their decisions.
The whole Protest is moving over there as we speak.

entries.context: They all run off.
Description
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consecteturew adipiscing elit. Nulla id sapien ut metus duba dapibus auctor. Nunc blandit in fermentumm
Smart Ass is in flanked by two riot cops and, after the line, is knocked out.
entries.sourceEnglish: You think this will be EASY, do you?

entries.context: Hard Ass runs in and confronts the riot cops.
Branch 1: Hard Ass loses the fight against the horde of riot cops.
entries.sourceEnglish: You saw here it folks... the expert on saving others: Hard Ass.

entries.context: After this line, skip to line 21.
Branch 2: Hard Ass wins the fight against the horde of riot cops.

entries.sourceEnglish: Save your breath. I didn't do it for you.
Then... are you here to humiliate me?

entries.context: Branch 2.1: If Good Hard Ass won in the E6 Nightmare fight.
entries.sourceEnglish: I'm here because we need everyone we can find to protect the Territory back home.
What a joke. Like I want to go back to that Hellhole.
It doesn't look like you're doing so well out here, Smart.
It's a bit of a Hellhole out here, too, to be honest.

entries.context: Branch 2.2: If Evil Hard Ass won in the E6 Nightmare fight.
entries.sourceEnglish: You have done enough of that to yourself.
You still want a Human for a Master?

entries.context: Branches (1, 2.1, and 2.2) combine. The other donkeys arrive.
entries.sourceEnglish: Don't stop the momentum! Keep pushing!
This is the building where the Humans make their decisions!

entries.context: The camera moves over to show the rest of the main herd arriving, starting with Nice, Slow, and potentially Sad).
entries.sourceEnglish: Hard Ass! Smart Ass! We found you!

entries.context: Kick and Thirsty enter.
Branch 3.1: Big Ass died in the Factory.
entries.sourceEnglish: He gave his life in the Factory to save all these idiots from slaughter.

entries.context: After this, skip to line 42 or 44.
entries.sourceEnglish: @#$%&! We weren't even able to SEND HIS SOUL!

entries.context: Branch 3.2: Big Ass survived the Factory (either by running or by fighting and winning)
entries.sourceEnglish: He gave his life in the Factory to save all these idiots from slaughter—

entries.context: Big Ass enters.

entries.sourceEnglish: They're just trying to survive, like us.
I am. And I did it.

entries.context: These lines only occur if Big Ass managed to destroy the factory.
entries.sourceEnglish: I faced off against the horrible Human in charge of the Factory.

entries.context: These lines only occur if Big Ass managed to destroy the factory.
entries.sourceEnglish: And I caused a massive explosion too.
Yeehaw! We're gonna be a Herd again!

entries.context: These lines only occur if Sad Ass deserted the Herd at the Zoo
entries.sourceEnglish: Still no sign of Sad Ass?

entries.context: These lines only occur if Sad Ass deserted the Herd at the Zoo
entries.sourceEnglish: Not after he ABANDONED us at the Zoo...
How the hell are we gonna make it back to our Farm without the ding dang Tractor-Machine?

entries.context: Branch 4.1: Kick makes a speech
entries.sourceEnglish: We're NOT going to leave any of us BEHIND!
We owe it to Big Ass to make sure EVERYONE finds a SAFE place to live.
If the Humans don't kill us today, they will kill us TOMORROW.
You have NO IDEA what we saw in that FACTORY!

entries.context: Branch 4.2: Big makes a speech

entries.sourceEnglish: These Asses deserve to find a safe place to live too.
If the Humans don't kill us today, they will kill us tomorrow.
You have no idea what we saw in that Factory!

entries.context: Line is different in Miro / branches converge here.
entries.sourceEnglish: Smart Ass, come up with a new P-P-Plan!

entries.context: Branch 5.1: Nice offers to go inside the government building.
entries.sourceEnglish: Yikes! Then maybe we join these other Asses and go inside!
But Nice Ass, this ain't our fight!

entries.context: Branch 5.2: Big offers to go inside the government building.

entries.sourceEnglish: We join these other Asses and go inside!
But Big Ass, this ain't our fight!

entries.context: Branches 5.1 and 5.2 converge.

entries.sourceEnglish: You might not agree with the tactics of the other Asses, but our goals are the same.
We're all on the same side.

entries.context: If Sad is there, he says this line.
If Sad is not there, Nice says this line.
Nice Ass runs inside and Thirsty calls after her. Everyone runs inside.
Before running in, this dialogue occurs between Big and Smart if Big Ass survives the factory.
Not in the Miro?

entries.sourceEnglish: You didn't have faith in me.
You didn't have faith in me.
You were just looking out for our own.
You were just looking out for our own.

entries.context: Description
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consecteturew adipiscing elit. Nulla id sapien ut metus duba dapibus auctor. Nunc blandit in fermentumm
Inside the government building now, Proper Ass addresses the crowd.
entries.sourceEnglish: No Human enters and no Ass leaves until we have determined our next move.
We gotta give the Humans our demands, but how?

entries.context: The camera goes over to the radio in one of the offices.
entries.sourceEnglish: *ksh* And we're back with this afternoon's special coverage of today's dramatic events.
Mecha's Government building has been overrun by donkeys.
That's right. You heard me, donkeys.
We have reports that all staffers have managed to escape out the back door.
Police are struggling to fathom how security forces and intelligence agencies have failed to stop the threat.
The animals appear to have escaped from Mme. Derriere's Assorted Meats and Beauty Goods Factory.
We'll have more on this story at the top of the hour.

entries.context: Music starts blasting and we have a couple minutes of the camera moving around to see the chaos of the Asses occupying the government building.
entries.sourceEnglish: Up next, the #2 song on Mecha's Top 40! asi9 by David Mesiha.

entries.context: The radio gets destroyed and the camera flies over to the front door.

entries.sourceEnglish: Is that a Human on their back?
We're occupying this building until our demands are met.
If only the apathetic Masses in the Astral Plane could meet Ass Souls of your caliber!
But that's only in stories for Foals...
Are you the Golden Ass? The Gods incarnate?!
I am one with many names: The Gods, HEE and HAW, Janus.

entries.context: Copy needed for separate animation depending on current Prophet Choice
entries.sourceEnglish: I am one with many names: The Gods, HEE and HAW, Janus.
But yes, I am indeed the Golden Ass.

entries.context: Copy needed for separate animation depending on current Prophet Choice
entries.sourceEnglish: But yes, I am indeed the Golden Ass.
I've come to lend my godly powers to the cause.

entries.context: Copy needed for separate animation depending on current Prophet Choice
entries.sourceEnglish: I've come to lend my godly powers to the cause.

entries.context:
PROPHET IS FEMALE
Go to line 32 (Foal) or line 62 (Cole).
entries.sourceEnglish: Behold, here with me, a special Prophet-Machine for the Humans to worship!

entries.context:
PROPHET IS MALE
Copy needed for separate animation depending on current Prophet Choice
entries.sourceEnglish: Behold, here with me, a special Prophet-Machine for the Humans to worship!

entries.context: Foal track, if Prophet.

entries.sourceEnglish: WOAH, look at all these new Ass friends!
Gosh. Little Foal? Is that you?
Yeah! Check it out! I'm a Prophet now! And a Machine!
Uncle Bad—Cole, built a cool Transformation-Machine and now I can walk on two legs!
A Machine for a Prophet? That's crazy!
And it sounds like a Foal too!
How do we know the Humans will listen to that Machine?
I think there's a setting—hold on... okay:
Splendid! I have no idea what she just said.
But this is what we've been waiting for!
Young Prophet, will you translate our demands to the Humans?
A wonderful collaboration! Just like old times.
Prophet, our first act will be to talk to these Asses.
We shall assemble an inspiring Manifesto for you to present to the Human public.
It shall be the first step towards winning Human allies to our cause.
Tell them we've suffered so much—
The Humans have to stop misrep—
SILENCE. You all have a lot to say, but we shall assemble this Manifesto in an orderly fashion.
Prophet, we must keep our demands succinct.
Choose the five best ideas from these Vassals and add them to the Manifesto.

entries.context:
Skip to line 96 and onwards. 
The following is a section where players will walk around and assemble a manifesto, chosen from the values of the many Asses inside the government building.
entries.sourceEnglish: After you fill your Manifesto, you can always replace a previous idea by choosing a new one.

entries.context: Cole track, if Prophet.
entries.sourceEnglish: What the fuck did you all do?
Golly, Bad Ass, is that you?
Nice Ass? Of course the Fannyside idiots would be here...
Mecha's Parliament is a place of democracy!
And you've shit all over it!
The Humans beat us, and even killed some of us too!
They didn't seem rational when they attacked us in the streets.
They don't value us... You don't know what it's like.
I do know what it's like to be treated like an Ass.
You've all come from places where you have been mistreated by Humans.
But Mecha's citizens are not like the others. They value science, progress, and reason.
Once they learn to see the world from your perspective, they will work with us to change the ways of Humans everywhere.
If you tell me your demands, I will relay them to the citizens of Mecha in their own language.
A wonderful collaboration! Just like old times.
Prophet, our first act will be to talk to these Asses.
We shall assemble an inspiring Manifesto for you to present to the Human public.
It shall change their philosophies about Asses, about Life, about Everything!
Tell the Humans we've suffered so much—
The Humans have to stop misrep—
SILENCE. You all have a lot to say, but we shall assemble this Manifesto in an orderly fashion.
Prophet, we must keep our demands succinct.
Choose the five best ideas from these Vassals and add them to the Manifesto.
After you fill your Manifesto, you can always replace a previous idea by choosing a new one.
Prophet, are you ready to begin?

entries.context:
Skip to line 96 and onwards. 
The following is a section where players will walk around and assemble a manifesto, chosen from the values of the many Asses inside the government building.

entries.sourceEnglish: Tell the Humans to respect the borders of our territory in Fannyside.

entries.context: Repeater line.
entries.sourceEnglish: These demands must be taken seriously.
Ask the Humans to let us have our own fields, where we can plow on our own terms!
Give Asses the right to anything that grows in any field they plow.

entries.context: Repeater line.

entries.sourceEnglish: Tell the Humans that we want to run our own businesses, like the Bottoms Up Bar!
Support Asses starting their own businesses.

entries.context: Repeater line.

entries.sourceEnglish: Tell the Humans that we can't work at a p-pace where we have to hurt ourselves to keep-p our Job-bs.

entries.context: Repeater line.
If Sad Ass went to the Fam.
entries.sourceEnglish: Tell the Humans that we want respect for our dead and a place to mourn...
Respect the dead and places of mourning.

entries.context: Go to 124, repeater line.
If Sad Ass went to the Fam. // Missing a line about dignity right before according to Miro.
entries.sourceEnglish: Tell the Humans that we won't perform anymore silly tricks to make them smile...

entries.context: Repeater line.

entries.sourceEnglish: Tell the Humans that we want NO MORE FIGHTING!
That's what my sister would have wanted.

entries.context: Repeater line.
In Miro it says: Tell the Humans... // If Big is dead.
entries.sourceEnglish: Tell them to close the Factories...
That's what Big Ass would have wanted.

entries.context: SmartAssLine

entries.sourceEnglish: What, are you expecting me to make a joke or something?

entries.context: In Miro it says: Tell the Humans... // If Big is alive.

entries.sourceEnglish: Tell the Humans to close their Factories everywhere...

entries.context: Same as line 134.
BigAssLine

entries.sourceEnglish: There are a lot of Humans gathering outside...
Maybe tell the Humans to listen to the silent ones.

entries.context: Repeater line.
entries.sourceEnglish: ...sometimes quiet types have the best things to say.
Tell the Humans that if they don't cede us territory, we will kill their children.

entries.context: Repeater line.

entries.sourceEnglish: I was born in a small village by the Ocean.
I used to carry baskets of Fish from the Harbour to the Human's market.
You won't believe what happened next.

entries.context: Menu option to keep going.
Menu option to exit dialogue.
entries.sourceEnglish: I think I get the point.
Whoda thunk it, but all the Fish eventually disappeared.
So I got a job working in the forestry business.
I was carrying trees day and night.
But then, you won't believe what happened next.

entries.context: Menu option to keep going.
Menu option to exit dialogue.
entries.sourceEnglish: I think I get the point.
I was blindsided! Whodda thunk it! The trees all left.
I'da left too if was them, getting cut down like.
I didn't wanna get cut down.
So I wandered a long while til I got pick up and taken to that evil Factory.
I was sure I was a goner.
But then, you won't believe what happened next!

entries.context: Menu option to keep going.
Menu option to exit dialogue.
entries.sourceEnglish: I think I get the point.
Some special someone with a big heart let us out!
Thanks so much for listening to me.

entries.context: Repeater line.
entries.sourceEnglish: Do you want to hear my story again?
Tell the Humans that they must bring us all of their food.
Give the Asses all your food.

entries.context: Repeater line.
entries.sourceEnglish: They eat meat. They can eat each other.
Tell the Humans that we will not give them rides on our backs anymore.
Some of us find it incredibly demeaning.

entries.context: Repeater line.
entries.sourceEnglish: Of course, Golden Ass, I don't mean to insult you if you enjoy it.
Tell the Humans to invest more of their resources into animal education.
Invest more resources in animal education.

entries.context: Repeater line.
entries.sourceEnglish: How will we ever be equal if we're not given the same opportunities that they give their own Foals?
Tell the Humans that we will only have sex with the Asses we want to. No more forced mating.

entries.context: Repeater line.
entries.sourceEnglish: Consent is what every Ass wants.
Tell the Humans to open their borders so we can roam freely anywhere we please.
Open Human borders so Asses can roam freely.

entries.context: Repeater line.

entries.sourceEnglish: Tell the Humans that they must commit resources and person-power to restoring and maintaining our natural habitats.
Commit resources to restoring and maintaining natural Ass habitats.

entries.context: Repeater line.
entries.sourceEnglish: Their industries and corporations are polluting our natural environments.
Tell the Humans that we deserve lifetime compensation for our sufferings.
Give Asses lifetime compensation for past sufferings.

entries.context: Repeater line.
entries.sourceEnglish: I'll never get back the years I spent being forced to walk in circles to mill their grains... but compensation is better than nothing!
Tell the Humans to stop misrepresenting us as stupid or stubborn mindless creatures.
We have feelings. Why can't they see that?
Stop misrepresenting Asses as stupid, stubborn, mindless creatures.

entries.context: Repeater line.
entries.sourceEnglish: I'm so tired of hearing Humans laugh at me when I sing.
Tell the humans to forgive any debts they think we owe them.

entries.context: Repeater line.

entries.sourceEnglish: Tell the Humans to support and appreciate our creative endeavours.
Support and appreciate Ass creative endeavours.

entries.context: Repeater line.
entries.sourceEnglish: No one seems to care about art these days.
Tell the Humans that we want representation in their systems of Government.
The Human global governing system disproportionately undermines the rights of Animals everywhere.
Give Asses representation in Human systems of Government.

entries.context: Repeater line.
entries.sourceEnglish: A Parliament full of Humans cannot represent all Animals.

entries.context: If manifesto is not filled.
entries.sourceEnglish: Our Manifesto is not yet finished, Prophet.

entries.context: If manifesto is filled.
entries.sourceEnglish: Are you ready to speak to the Humans?

entries.context: Menu option 1
Foal's response, if Prophet.
Cole's response, if Prophet.
entries.sourceEnglish: Umm...No. There's got to be one decent idea here somewhere. Not yet.

entries.context: Menu option 2
Foal's response, if Prophet.
Cole's response, if Prophet.
Kick interrupts and walks up to the Golden Ass.

entries.sourceEnglish: I wasn't sure at first, but...

entries.context: Copy needed for separate animation depending on current Prophet Choice

entries.sourceEnglish: Your sister gave her Soul to us so that we might return to this World and save it.

entries.context: Copy needed for separate animation depending on current Prophet Choice
entries.sourceEnglish: Your sister gave her Soul to us so that we might return to this World and save it.
I guess... you've finally gone to a place where I can't find you...
That is not true. You may join us on the steps as we push on into the future.

entries.context: Copy needed for separate animation depending on current Prophet Choice
entries.sourceEnglish: That is not true. You may join us on the steps as we push on into the future.

entries.context: The rest of the main Herd enters into frame.
Everyone exits to face the Humans outside.
ManifestoUI Line
Manifesto Panel Text
Description
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consecteturew adipiscing elit. Nulla id sapien ut metus duba dapibus auctor. Nunc blandit in fermentumm
Only said if Foal is Prophet.
entries.sourceEnglish: WOAH! I've never seen so many Humans!

entries.context: Only said if Cole is Prophet.
entries.sourceEnglish: Speak to them, Prophet! Share the demands of our Asses with the Humans of this city.
Win their hearts with honesty and truth.

entries.context: Depending on the Prophet, skip to line 7 or 28.
entries.sourceEnglish: May your followers remember this day as your first holy Mass.

entries.context: Foal track, if Prophet.

entries.sourceEnglish: By my Aunties and Uncles and friends.
Now that you all know the demands, we can change the System together.

entries.context: System is capitalized when it is "the" System
entries.sourceEnglish: My Uncle Bad—Cole taught me that the System is rigged against Asses.
But I kinda think the System is rigged against everyone!
Because no one here looks happy.
How am I doing Aunty Sick—Golden—Gods?
Now invite everyone to sing with us.
Let their voices reverberate through the bodies of this crowd!

entries.context: All the Asses sing together. After, jump to line 82.
entries.sourceEnglish: Cool, I now invite all my Aunties and Uncles and friends to sing TOGETHER!

entries.context: Cole track, if Prophet.
Branch 1. Imagination.
entries.sourceEnglish: Let me appeal to your imagination.
When you think of Mecha—what do you think of?
A place of scientific ingenuity? A bastion of democracy?
That's what I think of too.
But what do you think these donkeys think of when they think of Mecha?
They think of pain and violence.
The only reason any of us are here today, is because Humans have commodified their labour and their bodies.
But if we can collectively imagine Technologies designed to improve the world...

entries.context: Jump to line 48.
entries.sourceEnglish: Then surely we can imagine a future where Humans and donkeys can co-exist without exploitation.

entries.context: Branch 2. Reason.
entries.sourceEnglish: Let me appeal to your reason.
Let's think through this situation using reason.
These donkeys are occupying your Parliament building.
We can suppose that you are not happy about this occupation and that you want them to leave.
And you are not happy about their occupation because you do not see them as equals to the citizens of Mecha.
But if you expel them today, they'll likely be captured, only to possibly escape again and try to occupy the building again.
And if you let them stay, then you'll lose your Parliament and you'll feel threatened by what the donkeys might do next.

entries.context: Jump to line 48.
entries.sourceEnglish: The logical way out of this cyclical predicament is to compromise.

entries.context: Cole's branches converge (1 and 2).
entries.sourceEnglish: Towards that end, the donkeys have prepared a number of demands for you.
Some of these demands are more difficult to achieve than others.
Yet, all of us here, both Humans and donkeys, are rational beings.
We have the ability to accept these demands and transform the world for the betterment of these donkeys.
But you're probably not going to do anything, are you?
You're not going to fight for their rights or go to their protests.
You're just going to keep being stuck in a cycle, doomed to repeat the same stupid mistakes.
We're not better than these donkeys.
We're all stuck in a bad situation.

entries.context: Branch 2.1. Based on answers from the beginning of the show.
entries.sourceEnglish: Like you, these Asses think of themselves as political animals.
But they believe that simply voting for a leader is sufficient work by itself.

entries.context: Jump to line 72.
entries.sourceEnglish: Then they idly sit in the back and spectate while the few become corrupt with power.

entries.context: Branch 2.2. Based on answers from the beginning of the show.
entries.sourceEnglish: Like you, these Asses think of themselves as intelligent animals.
But all of their intelligence is being misused under the guise of neoliberal agendas.

entries.context: Jump to line 72.
entries.sourceEnglish: Their labour is feeding the capitalists and they're too stupid, too tired, and too angry to see the big picture.

entries.context: Branch 2.3. Based on answers from the beginning of the show.
entries.sourceEnglish: Like you, most of these Asses don't see themselves as political or intelligent animals.
They have been deprived of their agency and they lack the courage necessary to meaningfully participate in their society.

entries.context: Jump to line 72.
entries.sourceEnglish: They follow their leaders blindly, driven by nothing but a banal curiosity for destruction.

entries.context: Branches (2.1, 2.2, 2.3) converge.
entries.sourceEnglish: We've all spent too much of our lives following shitty leaders.
We thought these leaders would take care of us—all of us.
But time and time again, they fail us.
I'm not here to lead you.
So don't follow me. Don't follow anyone.
If our leaders are telling us that these Animals do not deserve to live, and we think otherwise...
Then the only logical thing for us to do is...

entries.context: Jump to line 82.
The Prophet is suddenly shot.

entries.sourceEnglish: Robots spewing propaganda—what will the Activists think of next!
My dear Officers, I'm deeply sorry...

entries.context: This is said if the Factory wasn't blown up.
entries.sourceEnglish: Clearly some misguided radicals broke into my Factory and haphazardly set these donkeys loose onto our beautiful city.

entries.context: This is said if the Factory was blown up.
entries.sourceEnglish: Clearly some misguided radicals BLEW UP my Factory and haphazardly set these donkeys loose onto our beautiful city.
I will pay for all of the damages they have caused, of course.
So please, do what you must.

entries.context: This is said if the Foal was the Prophet.
entries.sourceEnglish: Don't tell me you've been moved by that Manifesto and their cacophonous braying.

entries.context: This is said if Cole was the Prophet.
entries.sourceEnglish: Don't tell me that Robot convinced you that donkeys and Humans are all the same!
Donkeys are just unintelligent and uncultured beasts!
And I'm Mme. Derriere—Mecha's most philanthropic and generous employer.
My tax dollars pay for the health care of our citizens...
For our precious arts and culture!
Officers, these Asses are my Property.
I give you permission to fire at will.

entries.context: Gunshots sound and the screen burns to white.
entries.sourceEnglish: Do whatever it takes to end this most unfortunate siege against our democracy.
Operation Assassination, how did we not see it coming?
What shall our next move be?

entries.context: Description
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consecteturew adipiscing elit. Nulla id sapien ut metus duba dapibus auctor. Nunc blandit in fermentumm
Description
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consecteturew adipiscing elit. Nulla id sapien ut metus duba dapibus auctor. Nunc blandit in fermentumm

entries.sourceEnglish: And that is why every Ass today is born with the Soul of a Revolutionary—

entries.context: Cole track, if Prophet.

entries.sourceEnglish: What has this got to do with us?
Yeah, who you callin' an Ass?
Collective and direct action is our only solution.

entries.context: You = Vous/Ustedes to a group
entries.sourceEnglish: You can't just ignore the injustices that other Animals are facing.
Your apathy is actively perpetuating systems of exploitation for all living beings.
We share the same fucking struggle—
It took me a long time to see that I could have a role to play.
And when it arrives, I hope you will be part of it.
We can't leave this work to the Gods.
We must bear the burden of History and Progress together.
There are Humans coming down the road.
The next Farm is a day's walk away.
We've told them our story. It's up to them now.

entries.context: Final line of asses.masses.
entries.sourceEnglish: Do you think they'll join us?

entries.context: Foal track, if Prophet.

entries.sourceEnglish: It took me a long time to see that I could have a role to play.
All animals deserve to be free.
To live a life that is just.
But when it comes, I hope you will be part of it.
We can't leave this work to the Gods.
We must all bear the burden of History and Progress together.
Mother—I see a Human coming! Let's go!
UGH! This rain is so not good for my metal.
The next Farm is a whole day's walk away!

entries.context: Final line of asses.masses.
entries.sourceEnglish: Do you think they'll join us?

entries.context: Description

entries.sourceEnglish: a game by Patrick Blenkarn and Milton Lim

entries.context: Ugly Ass is not a character who ever has lines. They are just one of the options to have sex with in E1.
Spicy Ass is not a character who ever has lines. They are just one of the options to have sex with in E1. (Formerly called Sweet)
This character never speaks. But he's the farmer that Hard Ass kills in E4.
